items: Academic Excellence Award — NYU Tandon School of Engineering (2024)|Cyber Fellowship — NYU Tandon School of Engineering (2024)|NYU Cyber Fellows Ambassador — Selected as ambassador for NYU's Cyber Fellows program|Research Fellow, Earth Institute — Columbia University, Advanced Consortium for Cooperation, Conflict, and Complexity (AC4)|10 Under 10 — Hamilton College Alumni Achievement Award recognizing outstanding early-career impact|Phi Sigma Iota — International Foreign Language Honor Society|IB Excellence Award — International Baccalaureate Program Distinction

U.S. State Department Top Global Partner — RocketHub recognized as one of 12 top global partners in State of Global Partnerships Report (2015, Secretary John Kerry) for contributions to entrepreneurship and innovation|NSA Cyber Operations Certificate — National Security Agency designation for advanced cyber operations training|NSA Cyber Defense Certificate — National Security Agency designation for cyber defense expertise|FINRA Capital Markets Series XVII Leader — Guest Lecturer on Securities Regulation and Crowdfunding, Award of Recognition from FINRA|Six Sigma White & Yellow Belt — Process improvement and quality management certification|Certified Associate Scrum Fundamentals (CASF) — Agile project management certification|Bronze Lion at Cannes — Team award for virtual currency innovation with Wieden+Kennedy (2013)|Board Member — Crowdfunding Professional Association|Board Observer — Visionary Health|Forbes Technology Council — Founding Council Member contributing expert analysis on AI governance, cybersecurity, and innovation|IEEE New York Metropolitan Region — Professional Member|New York Academy of Sciences — Member|Association of Change Management Professionals (ACMP) — Member|Congressional Expert Witness — Testified before U.S. House Oversight & Reform Committee (2012) and Financial Services Committee (2014)
